# How to use Appdome's AI Agent Team

Last updated January 20, 2026 by Appdome

## Appdome’s AI Agent Team Overview

**Appdome’s AI Agents** deliver autonomous reasoning, real-time analysis, and conversational workflows across every stage of the mobile defense lifecycle. Each agent uses Appdome’s unified data, threat intelligence, and build context to provide precise insights, recommendations, and actions tailored to each mobile brand. Together, they help cyber, fraud, DevOps, support, and engineering teams understand threats faster, resolve issues efficiently, and maintain a strong, compliant defense posture at scale. All agents operate inside Appdome’s secure enterprise framework, ensuring safe, governed use of AI without exposing data to public models.

[![All Agents](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/All-Agents.png)](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/All-Agents.png)

### Prerequisites for Using Appdome’s AI Agent Team:

* Before using Appdome’s AI Agent Team, ensure you meet the following requirements:
* Appdome account ([create a free Appdome account here](https://fusion.appdome.com/signup))
* A license for Appdome Agentic AI
* [Mobile App](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/dev-sec-tools/how-appdome-works/begin-no-code-mobile-app-security-project) (.ipa for iOS, or .apk or .aab for Android)
* Signing Credentials (see [Signing Secure Android apps](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/appsec-release-orchestration/code-signing-protected-android-ios/code-sign-secured-android-apps-in-devsecops-build-system/) and [Signing Secure iOS apps](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/appsec-release-orchestration/code-signing-protected-android-ios/appdome-enabling-signing-secured-ios-apps-without-xcode/))

### [Coding Card](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/coding_card-1.png) Build Agent

Appdome’s Build Agent allows mobile teams select, configure, and build 400+ security, anti-fraud, anti-malware, and compliance protections directly into their Android and iOS apps. It analyzes the app’s architecture, frameworks, and components to automatically compile the correct defenses—no code and no SDK required. The Build Agent streamlines secure app delivery by ensuring every build is correctly protected, certified, and ready for release.

[![Build Agent 2](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/Build_Agent_2.png)](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/Build_Agent_2.png)

**Build**  
The Build Agent can initiate protection builds via Appdome’s CI/CD plugin, Dev-API, or the Appdome UI. It uses a modular, plug-in framework to automatically code and compile defenses into each app, matching the app’s unique architecture and components. This removes the need for manual coding and ensures consistent, correct implementation each time.  
**Certify**  
As part of the build workflow, the Build Agent automatically validates all applied defenses and generates a Certified Secure™ certificate for each release. This provides an auditable, build-by-build record of compliance and accelerates DevSecOps approval for every mobile app update.  
**Comply**  
The Build Agent operates inside Appdome’s enterprise-grade compliance system, tracking every build, change, API call, and access action. This gives organizations full visibility and audit control over the complete mobile app defense lifecycle. It ensures governance, transparency, and consistency across teams, pipelines, and app portfolios.

### [Remendiation Card](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/remendiation_card-1.png) AI Support Agent

Appdome’s Support Agent uses Agentic AI to identify on-device mobile threats and guide users through precise, real-time removal steps. It interprets each attack’s ThreatCode™ to tailor instructions to the user’s device, OS version, and specific threat scenario-eliminating manual discovery or investigation. Users and support teams can interact with the agent, ask questions, challenge instructions, and receive updated guidance instantly. This brings fast, contextual, end-user remediation to mobile brands, reducing fear, fraud, and support overhead.

[![Support Agent](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/Support_Agent-2.png)](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/Support_Agent-2.png)

**Rapid Threat Identification**  
Explains the threat and its impact immediately using the ThreatCode™ for accurate context. Ensures users understand what the threat is and why it matters.  
**Detailed Threat Discovery**  
Guides users to find the threat with simple, device- and OS-specific steps. Reduces guesswork and speeds up detection.  
**Precise Threat Removal**  
Provides clear, tailored steps to eliminate the threat and adjusts instructions if something doesn’t work. Ensures complete resolution without external research.  
**Collaborative Remediation Workflow**  
Lets users and teams ask, challenge, and refine instructions in real time. Supports sharing and collaboration inside Appdome for complex cases.  
**Enterprise-Grade Guardrails**  
Runs entirely inside Appdome’s secure platform with no data sent to public AI models. Uses no PII and enforces full audit and access controls for safe deployment.

### [Secops Card](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/secops_card-1.png) SecOps Agent

Appdome’s SecOps Agent autonomously analyzes each brand’s mobile attack surface and delivers clear, actionable insights in real time. It learns continuously from massive threat data streams and correlates attacks with each app’s defense posture to surface severity, impact, and risk. The agent also identifies trends on its own, sends instant alerts, and allows teams to explore any finding through a natural-language interface. This gives cyber, fraud, and risk teams fast, interactive intelligence to understand threats and decide on next steps.

[![Secopsagent Screen](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/SecOpsAgent_Screen.png)](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/SecOpsAgent_Screen.png)

#### Report Types

**Monthly Account Report**  
Provides a consolidated view of threat activity across all apps in the account, highlighting the most significant attacks and trends. Correlates threats with defense posture to show what was monitored, mitigated, or blocked. Ideal for high-level, business-focused visibility.  
**Bi-Weekly App-Specific Threat Category Reports**  
Breaks down threats per app by category, surfacing detailed patterns, anomalies, and evolving attack techniques. Links findings to app-level defenses to show exposures and blocked threats. Designed for continuous, app-specific monitoring.  
**On-Demand & Autonomous Reporting**  
Generates reports instantly for any app, threat category, or timeframe. Automatically produces alerts and insights when new patterns or emerging attacks are detected. All reports are interactive and support follow-up questions through the agent.

### [Dpm Card](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/dpm_card-1.png)DPM Agent (Defense Posture Management) – Coming Soon

The DPM Agent is designed to analyze and evaluate a mobile brand’s overall defense posture using Appdome’s unified data, build history, and threat signals. It uses Agentic AI models to understand how defenses are configured across apps, releases, and environments, and prompts teams when gaps, changes, or notable trends appear. As part of the AI suite, it collaborates with stakeholders to improve visibility and decision-making around which defenses to deploy and how to strengthen the mobile security posture.

### [Devops Card](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/devops_card-1.png) DevOps Agent – Coming Soon

The DevOps Agent applies Agentic AI to the mobile app build and deployment process, using Appdome’s decade of defense and build data to guide DevOps teams on configuration, implementation, and release readiness. It acts autonomously to analyze relevant mobile and threat data, prompting teams when new discoveries or optimizations are needed. By integrating into digital workflows, it helps DevOps scale securely and reduce manual work across the build lifecycle.

### [Research Card](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/research_card-1.png) Research Agent – Coming Soon

The Research Agent leverages Appdome’s global threat telemetry,trillions of live events-to investigate, correlate, and reason about emerging mobile attacks. It provides research-grade insights into fraud, ATOs, API threats, malware, and other evolving techniques, surfacing patterns and trends unique to each mobile business. Using a conversational model, it helps teams explore threats, compare posture to industry trends, and make data-driven decisions faster.
